snippet: Bryce A. Reed, arrested on charges that he had pipe bomb components, had been a public face of mourning in West, Tex. after a plant exploded.
abstract: Volunteer paramedic Bryce A Reed, arrested on charges he possessed pipe bomb components, denies involvement in deadly blast at fertilizer plant in West, Tex; authorities say they are opening criminal investigation into explosion, which killed 14, injured 200 and ravaged dozens of buildings.
lead_paragraph: Bryce A. Reed, arrested on charges that he had pipe bomb components, had been a public face of mourning in West, Tex. after a plant exploded.

headline.seo: Paramedic Bryce Reed Denies Role in West, Tex., Blast
headline.main: Paramedic Denies Role in Deadly Texas Blast
headline.print_headline: Paramedic Denies Role In Deadly Texas Blast
